1123111.title: Batman: Arkham Asylum

11231111.content:
“Gotham will be mine!”
Her seductive, sultry purr almost entranced you on the spot as you unclipped your last Batarang, snapping it out in your palm, and hurling it towards her floral chamber, hoping to weaken her empathetic connection with the Titan-enhanced plants enough to finally take her down.
The Batarang tore through the air like a boomerang on its one-way trip towards Poison Ivy, hurtling at top speed to finally bring the self-professed plant queen down.
Simultaneously, Ivy’s behemoth released another one of her toxic fireballs, flinging it towards you at such speeds that rivaled the Batarang itself.
The slits on your cowl widened as you realized that the fireball has hurtling towards you far quicker than you could roll to the side, and that within seconds, it would connect.
In a cruel twist of fate, Ivy somehow knew to maneuver her behemoth out of the projectile’s immediate trajectory, finally learning from her earlier mistakes of peeling back her shell for far too long.
Due to this new adaptation from the former botanist, the Batarang missed the plant/animal hybrid entirely, disappearing further into the greenhouse, while leaving you virtually unprotected.
And unfortunately for you, her fireball had met its target, and even more unfortunate, that target was you.
With great finality, the fireball connected, signaling the beginning of the end for you. In one fluid, yet savaging blow, the fiery projectile collided with your upper torso, sending you flying backwards. The sheer impact of the fireball was enough to derail your momentum even before you hit the ground. Your hand instantly dropped the second Batarang that you were aiming at Ivy’s chamber, mere seconds away from being launched as you began your downward spiral towards to the ground.
It was the ultimate shot, the biggest shot, and unfortunately, the last shot that you could endure. You had survived countless waves of inmates, chemically altered beasts, even reality-bending nightmares, but you could not survive the wrath of Poison Ivy.
You were unceremoniously thrown off your feet as the fireball penetrated your suit, nearly burning your armor into ashes. Thankfully, your protective armor managed to lessen the damage, but at the cost of its own integrity.
With an emphatic thud, you crumbled to the floor a fatigued, beaten, but most importantly shell of your former self. Sudden discharges flowed throughout your suit as System: Malfunction notices flooded your visor. You could barely hit the seismic sounds of Ivy’s pet behemoth grow nearer over the sudden pounding of blood in your ears, as well as the stiffness of your joints. The fight knocked out of you, a cold sweat began running down your spine as the sudden realization hit you.
You failed.
You failed not only yourself, but all of Gotham for that matter. You had failed to stop Poison Ivy, whose threat eclipsed even the Joker’s at this level. Now enhanced by the Titan formula, Ivy was even more powerful than before, and with her fanatical ideology, the innocents of Gotham would pay the ultimate price, that is, if there still is a Gotham tomorrow.
But more importantly than that, you had failed yourself. You had failed to uphold the promise you swore upon your parent’s grave, that you would fight injustice and bring order back to the streets of Gotham. That you would devote your entire life towards extinguishing crime from the face of the earth, and strive to make sure your parent’s sacrifice would be worth something.
Of course, you knew that the legend of the Dark Knight would never last forever. You knew that there would come a day where you would fall, and hopefully others would rise to take your place. But never did you even suspect that that day would come today, when the people of Gotham dependent on you the most, or even by the hands of Poison Ivy.
If only to punctuate that sudden realization, Ivy’s triumphant laughter broke your train of thought, and immediately dug into every inch of your skin. It was the laughter of a woman who at long last tasted the fruits of victory, and she was pleased.
A sudden numbness began overwhelming your joints and muscles as you felt the behemoth’s seismic movements grow even closer. Fatigue from an entire night of doing the work of a hundred men had slowly been eating away at your resolve, but now, you were out of energy to spare. You had exhausted your own physical limitations, and even at peak condition, the human being couldn’t take but so much.
Gritting your teeth angrily, you tried shaking that numbing feeling, rolling around, even bulging your biceps, but with every sound you tried moving, an aching pain punished you. Even your body knew that you had been defeated.
Soon, the behemoth collided with the ground, causing a small shockwave that gave you goosebumps. The sounds of the vine chamber opening caused you to shudder, knowing full well that the vindictive plant queen would much would probably to do the honors...personally.
“You came so close, Batman,” came her taunting sneer, as the cracked chamber finally slid open, and Poison Ivy stepped out.
“But no man is a match for my babies. Not even you,” she taunted yet again, her words slicing through your skin like knives through butter.
It was that fact that she had finally lived up to her own arrogant tagline that irked you to no end, the fact that her plants actually did defeat you!
“But you realize that now, don’t you?”
You instinctively cringed as the sound of Ivy’s bare feet approached, her soles loudly plodding on the ground. It was almost humiliating, just listening to her footsteps knowing full well that you can’t do anything to stop her or her plants.
“Your precious Gotham is mine now, darling. My children will enjoy tearing down your little paradise brick by brick, and the blood of those murderers will provide proper nourishment for my babies,” she sneered, absolutely taking her time, relishing in watching you squirm.
Out of your peripheral vision, you could make out her blurred red-and-green form sauntering towards you, one hand on her hips, and a vindictive grin carved all over her unblemished face.
Dressed from head to toe in a floral green, her alluring, promiscuous nature had certainly been reflected by her attire. Her official Arkham Asylum patient uniform was shed in favor for a more seductive look, only retaining her jacket. She wore no pants, instead revealing her long, shaped legs and bare feet, symbolizing her connection with the Earth. Her groin area was covered with a leafy green foliage pantie stretched to fit her hips, and her Arkham Asylum jacket was largely unbuttoned, only keeping two buttoned at the middle to contain her cleavage. Sleeves rolled up, her fingernails were also adorned with red nail polish.
Despite her human like appearance, Ivy was clearly more plant than woman. Her genetic coding had been infused with plant DNA, causing her body to emulate a more plant-like appearance. The newly created chlorophyll running through her veins had caused pigments in her body to color her skin a leafy green from top to bottom. Her poison-laced lips were a crimson red, perhaps make her more vampiric. To cap it off, her hair was a fiery red, not bound by any material to allow it to flow more freely, creating a more natural, untamed look. Her eyes of course, were a light green. To add to those bizarre features, vines had latched on her body, maneuvering in such a manner as to resemble body tattoos. They seemed to be already embedded within her skin. Covering her body in a darker shade of green, the vines only seemed to emphasize Ivy’s connection with nature.
However, based on your...distinct position, the most noticeable part of Ivy, weirdly enough, were her bare feet. Her toes adorned in a bright red nail polish, she strutted towards you at a very ‘supermodel’-esque pace, showcasing her very desirable body, but it was her feet that stood out the most, so much so that you could vividly describe the process of her step.
Her heel collided briefly with the floor first, before her sole gently rested on the ground, allowing her toes to grip the long grass. Finally, she lifted her foot up and after showing her quite sexy arch, began to place her other foot forward, repeating the process. In a way, it was actually quite alluring, attractive perhaps.
Of course, that could probably be the concussion talking.
Her delicate, poison-tipped lips curled into a vindictive smile as she finally came to a halt on one side of your cowl, now towering above you.
Your vision finally cleared to the sight of her painted toes, smudged slightly from your back-and-forth duel, now centimeters from your mouth. Out of the corner of your eye, you could make out her absolutely
“Hurts, doesn't it?” Ivy sneered vindictively, now just pouring salt over your open wounds.
Groaning slightly, you tried turning away, but sharp pains in your torso and legs disagreed.
She merely snickered evilly under her breath, absolutely relishing your wounded state.
“Did you really think, Batman, that you could beat Mother Nature all by yourself?” she chided with the playful tone of a schoolhouse teacher.
A pained groan escaped your charred lips as she knelt down beside you, her pheromone cloud beginning to circulate around you, only enhancing her flowery scent.
“Pamela…..please,” you croaked out weakly, but Ivy hushed your pleas by closing your lips together with her index finger.
“You’re not in any position to make demands, darling,” she purred in a sexy drawl, before letting her delicate fingers caress your bruised cheekbone, her nails gliding over your charred flesh and slash marks.
Grinning from corner to corner, she cradled your head in her forearms, like a mother cradling her newborn, stroking your face gently before her lips curled into a triumphant grin.
“However, you are going to give in to mine.”
11231111.title: Alternative ending to Batman: Arkham Aslyum (Po...

11231112.content:
The head of Ivy’s botanic monster finally crashed to the ground, creating shock-waves that dusted your weary cape, the dust littering your already torn and bullet-hole ridden cape.
As the chamber collided with the door, you could barely make out Ivy still inside, her body limp and motionless as an effect of the empathetic connection she had to her “babies.”
“Whatever they felt she felt, only worse,” you grimly thought to yourself, a Batarang still in one hand.
You had been fighting Ivy for the better part of ten minutes, evading her fireballs and taking down the hypnotized Arkham staff she managed to ensnare with her pheromones. The battle was over for her, but for you, the war was only beginning. Joker still had an abundant supply of Titan with him, and now that Ivy’s threat had been neutralized, you could focus on taking him down.
Memories of the last few moments flashed before your eyes, as you recalled how one decisive Batarang through Ivy’s protective shell was enough to down the self-appointed plant queen, the Batarang only adding to the cracks already protruding from her shell. With that blow, you had defeated Poison Ivy, if only barely.
You instinctively cringed as her seductive voice rang through your head, her vines choking you with the vengeance of a boa constrictor. Plus, your suit was still partially burned from all the toxic bubbles that had slammed into your body armor. Even with all your gadgets, it was Ivy’s own hubris that cost her everything. Her own arrogance that would become her downfall.
She had unknowingly made herself vulnerable every time she peeled back her outer shell to the cocoon, a mistake that you gladly took advantage of. With every Batarang that connected, you could feel her mental control over the monster deteriorate, and finally, with one last shot to the toxic temptress, she lost full control of the primal beast.
Gingerly approaching the chamber, you drew your always trusty Explosive Gel. Out of your peripheral vision, you gazed at her fallen warriors, the hypnotized Arkham staff who lay unconscious on the ground, the unintended casualties of your duel with Poison Ivy.
Finally reaching the outer chamber shell, you couldn't help but glare at the defeated villainess, her body still wrapped in vines. Out of pity for the former scientists, you refrained from quipping out any one-liners, instead resolving to end this before innocents in Gotham could be harmed by her radical fury.
Spraying the chamber with the Gel in the shape of a fitting Bat symbol, you instinctively stepped back as your finger closed around the trigger, preparing for detonation.
Just as your thumb touched the trigger, Ivy suddenly snapped out of her dazed form, instantly realizing what was happening. She futilely jumped at you, her fists pounding the shell from inside.
“Please Batman don’t! Don’t hurt my babies!” she pleaded, her eyes almost begging you.
“Your ‘babies” would've destroyed this island as well as Gotham. I’m shutting you down Ivy,” you retorted stoically.
“No please!” she whimpered, causing you to shudder inside, realizing the lows Ivy was willing to drop to protect her children.
Still, for a second there, you nearly hesitated, and risked her taking advantage of your sympathy. But you of all people knew that Ivy was just like the other criminals, perfectly willing to leech off of your own sympathy and use it as her own personal ammunition.
“I’m sorry Pamela, but I’d be risking the lives of every single man and woman on this island, as well as thousands more in Gotham if I just ‘let you go.’” you ultimately refused, your thumb pressing down on the trigger.
“Wait, I know where the rest of the guards are!” she suddenly blurted out, at this point resorting to any means necessary to protect the plants.
Deciding to humor her pleas, you rolled your eyes, knowing that you had already rescued all the Arkham staff.
“What are you talking about?” you growled, becoming more and more irritable.
“The men, the guards who wanted to lock me back up in that cell. I only converted half of them to my cause, the rest I…..locked away,” she confessed, a sly grin spreading across her face when she realized that she had the edge over you.
Knowing that Ivy would resort to any measures to protect her babies, you continued pressing the question, hoping to knock her off guard.
“What do you mean, locked away?” you demanded.
“In the penitentiary, while you were busy in Killer Croc’s lair. I had captured ten of the meat-sacks, and had my ‘babies’ lock those monsters away in those other’s lunatic’s cells. Quite fitting, now that I think about it.” She stopped to savor your irritable expression before continuing. “Knowing that you were coming after me, I couldn't risk them going free with their hands stained in the blood of my poor children. When I locked them inside, I filled the room with an airborne toxin, one of my newest creations. They’ll be dead within the hour.”
“What if I say you’re lying?” you snarled through gritted teeth.
“So you don’t want to save your people?” she purred, a clever grin brewing on her face knowing that she had you in check, with only one way out.
Her way.
You narrowed your eyes, knowing that she had a point. It was too big of a risk to let her go, but also too big of a risk to jeopardize those guards if she was indeed telling the choice.
Reluctantly, you put down the Explosive Gel, taking a minute to ponder the legitimacy of her confessional. From a psychological standpoint, you knew that a person would do anything to escape capture, even compromising their trump card. But from a logical standpoint, it didn't add up to why Ivy would risk losing her advantage over you this quick.
Still, you had an advantage as well in the form of the Gel, and you intended on pressing that advantage.
“What keeps me from pulling this trigger right now and killing every plant in this greenhouse, Ivy?” you continued, trying to call her bluff.
“Morality, conscience, try a sense of obligation darling. I know that you of all people couldn't live with yourself if those poor innocent officers met their end right now. Their blood would be on your hands dear, not mine,” she pointed out, her seamless logic even catching you off guard.
Amidst your internal tug-of-war of the issue, Ivy had mentally summoned a vine to her aid, the lone plant slithering across the ground behind you. Crawling over the unconscious bodies of her brainwashed muscle, the vine was nearing you at a breakneck pace, and you couldn't be anymore oblivious.
“We do this, we do this my way, Ivy! No tricks, no going back on your word. We do this, we do it my way, and mine alone. You so much as breathe in my direction, and I’ll make sure you never walk again!” you growled.
In response, she merely flashed a seductive smile at you, her face still pressed against the cracked shell.
“Oh come now Batman. I thought you knew me better than that,” she smiled, causing you to collectively cringe.
Now shelving the Explosive Gel, you started to break open the shell to release Ivy, when she did the one thing that you should've seen coming from the moment she started lying.
She outsmarted you.
The vine wrapped around your wrist just as you were about to pound through the shell, catching you by surprise, and to your utter regret, off guard.
With your hand now ensnared by Ivy’s vine, you attempted to slice through it with your gauntlet blades, only for another vine to curl around your neck, constricting you. As it tightened around your throat, you were forced to stare at Ivy, who waved at you almost mockingly, her eyes taunting you.
“After all, if you knew me, you’d know that I’d rather die than help you, you pathetic meat-sack,” she snarled, as another vine wrapped around your waist.
“But don’t worry darling, at least their deaths will be quick, painless even, but for your crimes against nature Batman, you will die a beaten, broken man by my feet,” she smiled, before flicking her fingers towards you dismissively.
Obeying their mistress, the vines threw you backwards, your arms flailing wildly through the air as you attempted to regain some sense of balance. Landing hard on your neck, the momentum carried you over on your sides. Rolling over on your back, you opened your eyes just in time to see your Explosive Gel, right in front of you.
Without thinking, you lunged at the gun, only for fate to reveal its cruel hand. Just as your fingertips touched the gadget, one of Ivy’s vines pounded it into the ground, crushing it into pieces just as you were about to grasp it.
Your eyes widened in surprise as you instead picked up the remains of your “secret weapon” against Poison Ivy, the gel splattered across the floor and the machine parts littered across the gooey remains.
Turning towards the plant queen with an unmistakable fury in your eyes, you saw how she managed to regain control over the beast, and willed the creature to lift itself off of the ground, its cracks still visible.
A confident smile decorated her face, as she leered at you from above, the vines once again wrapping around her body, keeping her tethered to the creature.
“Now, what are you going to do, little man?” she grinned, as the plant creature reached its full height.
“You made a mistake, Isley. I’ll make sure you won’t make another one,” you snarled, drawing a Batarang from your utility belt.
“A mistake dear? No, I’m afraid it was you that made the mistake, Batman, when you decided to go up against Mother Nature,” she proclaimed proudly, as the plant creature roared at him.
It was at that second that you knew what you had to do.
Defeat Poison Ivy.
11231112.title: Alternative ending to Batman: Arkham Asylum ( P...

1123112.content: These are the two options provided down below:
1123112.title: Batman: Arkham City

choices: Ivy is attempting to escape from Arkham City! (Robin)
Ivy teams up with Harley Quinn to finally take down the Dark Knight! (Batman)
11231121.title: Aftermath of Batman: Arkham City

112311212.content:
“Noooooooooooo!”
The last of Ivy’s serpentine vines flailed to the floor in one definitive motion, as your always reliable Batarangs sliced through their mouths, their inner liquids spraying out as they flopped down below.
Another Batarang drawn in one hand, you turned to the now seething Ivy, who glowered at you resentfully from her flowery throne.
“You’re starting to annoy me, Batman,” came her irritable response, her previously playful manner gone in favor of an incensed scowl. Her face was absolutely livid with fury, and you merely smiled at her chagrin.
“Good, then maybe you’ll start listening to reason, Pamela,” you smiled in return, clearly relishing in her infuriated expression.
Upon first glance, any other male would've been immediately entranced by her quite alluring and seductive appearance. The former botanist was almost naked, save for a foliage pantie that stretched between her hips, covering her groin area as well as a red Arkham City jacket that she left unbuttoned save for one at the very center, containing her cleavage.
Her skin complexion was a leafy green, a likely side effect of the effects of her “failed” experiments years ago. What appeared to be vines decorated her body almost like body tattoos. Her fiery red hair was untamed, dropping down from her shoulders. Her eyes, a lighter shade of green, were visibly annoyed as they glared at you. Her toes, as well as her fingernails, were painted a bright red.
“Reason? You are the reason why my ‘babies’ fear and despise you pathetic meat-sacks, and you will be the reason why I destroy Gotham, darling,” she screeched instead, defiance still prevalent in her.
You sighed, knowing that she was far too stubborn to give up, at least not willingly.
“Case you haven’t noticed Pamela, your ‘reason’ for all this stemmed from Professor Strange, who brought you to Arkham City in the first place. Now, he’s dead and you’re fighting an already lost battle,” you tried to reason with her, but to no avail.
“Perhaps love, but you, like the rest of your precious Gotham, will join Strange soon enough,” she smiled, before gesturing at you yet again.
As if on cue, even more of her vines burst out of the ground, causing you to narrow your eyes irritably as they lunged at you, their mouths positively beaming with greenish liquids. Mere seconds after she mentally ordered the command, you let your honed instincts kick in.
Throwing yourself to your right, you let your shoulder hit the ground first, allowing for you to successfully roll to your feet, a Batarang drawn in each hand just as the vines whistled past your body.
The vines made a U-Turn and continued pursuing you, but it was too late.
Without hesitation, you hurled the projectiles at them, the twin Batarangs whistling through the air as they impaled their respective vines, the now limp vines flailing to the floor.
You turned back to Ivy, who gestured at you yet again, her beautiful face now blemished by an ugly scowl.
Just as she flicked her finger at you, you could feel a rapid, almost violent vibration in the ground beneath you. As the ground continued to rumble, you quickly threw yourself backwards, not wanting to find out what lay beneath.
Just as your shoulders hit the ground now seven feet away, the ground that previously housed you suddenly exploded, a giant six-foot tall wooden spike shooting out of the floor where your feet were mere seconds ago. It would have impaled you, had your instincts been a few seconds slower.
“That’s new,” you remarked aloud, before drawing another Batarang in one hand.
Still visibly agitated, Ivy gestured at you again, causing yet another one of her serpentine vines to unravel from the ceiling. Only this time, the vine was much larger than the previous ones, its sides decorated with sharp thorns.
Without seconds of sensing your presence, the vine lashed out at you, but you were ready.
Hurling the Batarang at it with extreme precision, the projectile flew through the air as it neared its target, now only feet away.
But just as it was about to slice through the plant, the vine suddenly changed trajectory, instead maneuvering around the projectile with the agility of a cobra.
Your eyes widened at this unexpected act of strategy by the vines, but what surprised you even more was what came next.
While you missed your target, the vine certainly didn't miss its target, slashing you right across the cheek upon arrival.
With a grunt, the combined momentum behind the vine’s blow sent you flying backwards, as you landed on your stomach hard, your jaw sliding across the floor before your body skidded to a stop. You rubbed your cheek sorely, as an angry blotch soon formed on your already bruised and battered face.
“You’re predictable, darling! Did you really think your little ‘toys’ would stand a chance against my babies? Unlike you Batman, my babies adapt to their surroundings. The only question is: can you?” came Ivy’s seductive purr.
Out of the corner of your eye, you could barely make out the vine hurtling towards you yet again, this time the very tip of its mouth aimed at your very vulnerable spine.
Only this time, you were ready for it.
You let your body grow limp as it neared you, instead waiting until it was within range. Within seconds, the vine was almost upon you, and you sprang into action.
Flipping over on your back, you hurled a freeze grenade at it just as it was about to impale you, the grenade flying through the air. A blue aura briefly erupted from the projectile before it finally exploded, containing the vine in a very large block of ice. The ice quickly stretched throughout its long snake-like body, successfully containing the plant, causing the forces of gravity to kick in.
With a thud, the now limp vine crashed into the ground, splintering into several pieces in the process.
Jumping to your fight, you smiled at the seething Ivy, still partially in shock.
“You’re not the only one who's been busy since Arkham Asylum, Ivy. I've gotten some new upgrades,” you grinned, much to her chagrin.
“I see. But even your ‘toys’ can’t save you from Mother Nature, Batman. And I’m just getting started,” she declared, before raising her hands, closing her eyes in deep concentration.
You started to hurl a Batarang at her in her brief moment of vulnerability, but something stopped you. Or rather, someone.
Just when you were about to throw the Batarang at her, what looked like a human arm suddenly shot out of the ground. Except it was green, very green.
You openly gaped as more of its body was revealed, the humanoid now digging its way out. First, its shoulder, then its torso, then its leg, then its head.
The only problem was: it was your head.
In a very crude twist of irony, its head was bat-shaped, or rather, shaped like your own cowl. Fitted with your own signature ears as well as the half-mask, a sinister smile crossed its face, as its entire torso became visible now. Same utility belt, same chest-plate, same cape. its skin felt genuine, except that it wasn't. Its brown skin complexion was actually a college of thinned tree roots working in perfect cohesion, merely creating the illusion of skin. Its suit had the same light blue/black color scheme, save for a starkly different insignia. A rose symbol.
You nearly dropped the Batarang out of sheer disbelief, as Ivy somehow successfully managed to duplicate your own appearance into one of her own “creations.”
With one final push, the plant look-alike crawled out of the hole, much to the pleasure of the vindictive Ivy, who laughed at your shock. After brushing some dust off its shoulders casually, it turned to you, and began leisurely walking towards you, its fists clenched.
“You look surprised love. Is it because you have finally met your match, or perhaps, is it because the realization finally dawns on you, that you can’t defeat Mother Nature?” Ivy cried gleefully, as the creature continued stalking towards you.
“Your plants are cute, Pamela, but if you think one of your bush sculptures will stop me, you’re as delusional as ever,” you declared heroically, trying to conceal your initial shock.
“Good point. How about three?” she quipped.
As if on cue, two more Batman-look-alikes suddenly burst out of the ground, identical to the original in every way. They quickly turned to their leader, who nodded at them in return.
Like a collective brain, they simultaneously began stalking towards you, a three-on-one advantage.
You narrowed your eyes, now forced to contend with three of Ivy’s ‘champions’, as well as keeping the plant queen herself at bay. Still, a look of uncertainty began to dawn on you, as you involuntarily began backing away.
The toxic temptress obviously noticed your reluctance and capitalized on it.
“What’s wrong Batman? You look scared,” she sneered seductively, crossing her legs in her leafy throne.
Deciding to test just how similar they were to the original, you experimentally hurled your Batarang at one of them.
Like you feared, the clone caught the Batarang in mid-air, the blade just inches away from impaling its eye socket. It then almost casually crushed the steel projectile with both hands, before tossing it over its shoulder like a crumpled up piece of paper.
“Your toys won’t save you this time, darling, and neither with the Boy Blunder. Tonight, I'm going to destroy Arkham City, then, your beloved Gotham,” she continued, absolutely beaming at your plight.
"Once I get through with them Isley, I'm coming after you," you growled through gritted teeth.
In response, she merely laughed exotically.
"I doubt it."
The clones soon surrounded him, their facial expressions blank but their fists clenched. You could tell that they were just waiting for their mistress to give the order.
“But first, I think I’m going to enjoy this. You had your chance Batman, now time to die like the rest of the meat. Boys, if you will,” she smiled, taunting you with a thumbs-down gesture.
“Kill him.”
112311212.title: Ivy teams up with Harley Quinn to finally take ...

11231122.content: The two options are listed below:
11231122.title: During Batman: Arkham City

112311221.content:
You had to admit it: sometimes in high-pressure situation, your judgement tends to become a little muddled.
Even more so when you’re forced to make fragile alliances with people who to them is the last thing on their minds. It soon became painfully obvious to you that going to Poison Ivy was an ill-fated decision, especially given the quite recent history between you too.
After all, you were responsible for her current state thanks to the Titan overdose, and if only to add fuel to the fire, you destroyed the mass majority of her plants at the old Arkham Island.
And as the vines continued to slither around your writhing body, your sudden realization of this truth couldn't be more obvious.
“You shouldn’t have come here, Batman,” came her taunting sneer, as the vines continued strangling you, denying you even a moment’s rest.
And while your resilience was enough to power through the first couple of minutes, you had to rely on pure adrenaline and willpower to survive the next.
“Pamela, please,” you pleaded, couching out between every wheeze in your voice. You could hardly breath, yet made out those two words, another example of your resiliency.
“Pamela Isley died a long time ago, darling. Maybe you should’ve thought of that before you decided to intrude on our garden and take what so rightfully belongs to us,” she smiled coyly, as the vines continued curling around your arms, the thorns pricking your body armor.
Still wincing heavily, you were starting to lose feeling in your legs as the vines continued entangling you in their intricate web of pain. The much larger vines had wrapped around your knees and ankles, rendering you immobile while the more smaller and agile ones wrapped around your neck and torso, effectively choking you.
Lifting you off the ground, the vines suddenly tightened down on your midsection. You barely fought back a shriek through gritted teeth and determination, but even that was running out. And as you groaned audibly, your teeth clattering with every squeeze, you knew that deep down, Ivy was enjoying this.
“Come on, darling! Scream for me, make this interesting for me! After all, with a snap of my fingers, I could kill you in a heartbeat! Why don’t I give you an example?” she purred evilly, before playfully snapping her hands together.
As if on cue, the vines constricted around you with the strength of a boar, almost impaling your insides with your elbows. And as you felt their thorns tearing through your chestplate and digging into your exposed flesh, you could feel a surge of white hot pain emitting from your ribs. It was agony beyond the meaning of the word, and you could do nothing to stop it.
“Aaarrgghhh!” You instinctively flinched as the first cry escaped your lips, the next few soon to follow. As soon as you heard it echo, you knew Ivy was listening.
“You can do better,” she sang mockingly, before snapping her fingers yet again.
With that, the thorns drew blood, drilling through your skin and lacerating your flesh in a crude pattern. Screaming out loud in pain, you knew that Ivy was absolutely ecstatic, knowing that she was exerting a certain degree of physical as well as mental dominance not shown by any of your other rogues.
For as long as you held out, you soon found it futile to even struggle against the vines, for they were simply too relentless, too powerful for you to overcome. Fatigue had worn on your joints as well as a collection of bruises and cuts which had already accumulated over the course of the entire night. Factoring in Joker’s diseased blood which had already weakened your internal systems as well, it was safe to say that you were clearly not running on 100%.
Noticing the resignation almost radiating from your body, Poison Ivy snickered wickedly, knowing that she was finally victorious, and that you had finally fallen victim to her vines.
“Now now, I think our dear Dark Knight has had enough, my loves!” she smiled, beaming at your plight.
Obeying their mother’s commands, the vines would loosen their death grip over you, gradually unraveling one at a time. Even though they weren't strangling you, you could still feel your insides being squished as they relented, your breaths becoming more and more realized.
As soon as the last vine retracted from your chest, you collapsed in a heap, barely able to stand. Still wheezing form the vice grip, you panted heavily, and clutched your shoulder blades, which were still throbbing in pain. Tracing over the deep lacerations made by her vines over your exposed skin, you winced with every touch.
“Looks like you thought you could contend with Mother Nature, and lost, little man,” Ivy chided playfully, before beginning to saunter towards you. Her hips swaying about, you could barely make out her silhouette growing closer and closer.
In the meantime, you barely managed to lift your head up as she neared you. From your peripheral vision, you could make out the plant queen almost taking her time sauntering down her throne to the ground, her hips swaying voluptuously.
Pigmented in floral green from head to toe, the former botanist was truly a specimen to marvel. She only wore the standard Arkham City jacket, only two buttons at the center containing her cleavage. Her hair was a fiery red, untamed and freely flowing down her shoulders. Her legs were well-shaped, with leaves decorating her thighs and ankles.
Thanks to your somewhat grounded position though, the first part of Ivy to come into sight would be her toes, each appropriately adorned in red nail polish. You couldn't help but notice how fitting they looked compared to the rest of her body, the red-and-green color scheme indicative of nature itself.
“You’re ours now, Batman,” Ivy purred seductively, her words rolling off her tongue in a sexy drawl.
She finally came to a stop in front of you, as if she was showcasing her quite attractive physique. Still in a daze from the vice grip, you could still make out the green blur in front of you, as it finally cleared to reveal a leering Ivy, a triumphant grin spread across her face.
“Now what ever shall I do with you, Mr. Batman? After all, you and I both know that your crimes against my children must not go unpunished, especially after what you did at the island,” she purred, almost scolding you in a disciplinary manner.
“You were endangering the lives of the entire Arkham staff as well as the inmates, Isley. You had to be stopped!” you tried to reason with her, but even you knew the futility of your words.
“Hah, those pathetic meat-sacks had it coming. After all, they were the ones who locked me up in that cell for months on end, separating me from my babies, torturing me with their pained cries for their mother.” She stopped for a moment, and shuddered, as if repressing a bad memory.
She reaffirmed her glare with a bright smile before continuing.
“But that’s all in the past now, darling. After all, I have you now Batman, and I intend to make you pay, in full,” she smiled.
She started counting with her fingers, as if trying to think of crude ways to “punish” you, her brow wrinkled in deep concentration.
Soon, you turned to desperation as a last resort, and decided to reveal your true motives for entering her lair. At this point, trying to entice the plant queen with an even trade would be most wise, especially given your current position.
“Pamela, please! I need a cure for Titan poisoning,” you finally blurted out, catching even her off guard.
She gave you a slightly puzzled look, before a clever, almost dominant grin settled in. And with that reveal, she leaned in towards you, a curious twinkle in her eyes.
“I’m sorry?” she smiled, tilting her head in mock confusion.
You hated when she did that.
“Joker poisoned me with his own blood, still contaminated with the Titan strain. And I know that you managed to cure yourself of the Titan overdose yourself back at the asylum. I’m not asking for any favors Ivy, but an even trade,” you proposed.
In return, she merely laughed girlishly, almost in hysteria over your proposal. Tilting her head back, you could almost see tears rolling down her eyes before she calmed down, and flashed you yet another seductive grin.
“And why should I help you, darling?” she chided, stroking your chin affectionately.
Despite her smug exterior, you could tell from her eyes what she really wanted you to say. And as much as it would pain you, you had to give it to you.
“Because I can give you what you want,” you said, your eyes concentrating on her.
“And what’s that?” came her slightly bored reply.
“Payback, revenge for your babies, a sense of fulfillment, of accomplishment even,” you told her.
She raised an eyebrow, now piqued by your offer.
“Go on,” she prompted.
“I’ll do whatever it takes Ivy, anything that you want me to do. Give me the cure for the Titan formula, and you can have me, body and soul,” you added, as if to sweeten to deal.
“You sure do know how to make a girl happy, Batman. Your offer is tempting, I will admit, but unfortunately for you dear I am the ultimate temptation,” she smirked cleverly.
You gritted your teeth angrily, having to swallow your pride and to a greater extent, your dignity.
“Think about it, Ivy. I won’t fight back this time. You can do whatever you want with me, finally do what you've always wanted,” you continued to pressure, causing her eyes to glimmer mischievously.
She cupped your chin with one hand, maintaining eye contact with you before continuing.
“I should kill you, darling, for hurting my babies. But there’s always a time for that. And besides, I have something more fitting for the likes of you,” she finally accepted, albeit reluctantly.
“So you’ll take my offer?” you implored, your voice shaky.
“You’ll take my offer, darling,” she corrected, caressing your bruised cheek with one finger.
“And what’s that?” you asked, slightly afraid.
“I thought you’d never ask,” she said, giving you a mischievous grin before saying:
112311221.title: Search for a Cure (Batman)

choices: Kiss the feet of Poison Ivy
1123112211.content:
“What?” you instantly bellowed, absolutely arranged by this quite demeaning deed.
It was finally those three words that finally broke you out of your stupor, that finally brought you back to the grim reality of it all.
Your struggles became reinvigorated as well, the vines sensing your struggles grow tenfold within seconds. But alas, Ivy had anticipated your resistance to this quite unorthodox request.
In a split second, vines shot out of the crevices from the degraded floor and quickly wrapped around you in a floral web, binding your wrists behind your back and rendering you utterly defenseless, much to the delight of the plant queen.
“You heard me,” she purred seductively, before standing up and extending her bare foot towards you.
Despite your struggles, the vines curled around your neck, before forcing your neck downwards, and subsequently your vision dropped to Ivy’s (admittedly) well pampered right foot.
With several vines adorned around the naked limb like tattoos, her slender arch created a visible shadow on the ground. The bright red nail polish adorning each of her shapely toes was a perfect companion to her floral green skin color, a surprisingly fitting contrast of red and green that certainly warranted a lingering yet curious from your lingering eyes.
Even Ivy noticed your lingering gaze and cooed softly as she sensed your hesitation. “As I told you long ago lover, no one can resist Poison Ivy. Not even you.”
Your eyes narrowed as you glared back at her in solemn defiance. “I’d rather kiss the dirt six feet under.”
She made an offended sound as she cocked her hips to the side in an overly seductive pose. “You’d rather die than do such a painless, harmless little thing as to kiss my foot?”
“What do you really want, Pamela? What's your real game here?” you growled angrily, still struggling against her floral webbing.
“Why, my dear Dark Knight,” she purred. “I only want you to admit the truth that’s so apparent even the World’s Greatest Detective must admit: that I am better than you. And what better way to show that than to kiss the feet of your obvious superior,” she declared pompously, her hubris almost as palpable as the humidity.
“I may be dying, but I’m not that desperate. You’d have better luck getting Harley to abandon the Joker than me prostrating myself just to satiate your ego,” you snarled.
A twitch in her domineering smile betrayed a twinge of sympathy for the former Arkham Asylum psychiatrist turned psychopathic jester for the Joker. Poison Ivy had always had a soft spot for Harley Quinn, which could only be expected considering their similar backgrounds.
Usually, that was a weakness you could exploit but the plant queen quickly saw through and with a snap of her fingers the serpentine vines coiled around your already battered torso once again.
“Oh, but you are desperate, Batman. Why else would you come to me to give you an antidote for the Titan? You could’ve thawed out that snowman Victor Frieze in Penguin’s little museum if you wanted a possibility of a cure, but you knew that only my purity could cleanse you of the Titan strain. I really am your last hope now aren’t I?” she replied snidely, clearly relishing the control she had over you both physically and verbally.
“Not.....that.....desperate,” you maintained through gritted teeth as the vines continued restricting against you.
Kneeling down in front of you, she playfully ran her fingers across your left cheekbone, the bruise left by Harley’s baseball bat still throbbing as her fingertips touched it. Her presence mere inches away from you caused you to instinctively flinch, as the aura of pheromones around her attacked your senses on all sides and immediately began affecting your perception of the red haired vixen.
Your near indomitable will always cancelled out Ivy’s pheromone suggestion before, but in your weakened state of mind and every ache and sore in your body now exacerbated thanks to the Titan coursing through your veins you were now becoming more and more susceptible to her influence.
“Tsk tsk Batman. You could make all of this pain, all of this hurt go away. Just like that. All you have to do is pucker up, and give Mother Nature a little kiss. What’s so bad about that?” she grinned, her lower lip curling into a pout as you strained yourself not to lunge at her.
“I-I can’t,” you finally grunted, just barely fighting off her control much to Ivy’s utter amusement.
“Can’t or won’t, darling? You can’t degrade yourself, but you can let Strange and his army of meat-sacks take over your city. Your precious Gotham, left ripe for the taking by those murderers and rapists. All because you wouldn't kiss my feet. You’d rather see your city burn then humble yourself. You know, for all of your self-righteous talk you’re just as arrogant as me, Batman,” she sneered vindictively, her words piercing your skin like knives.
Perhaps it was your impaired judgement thanks to her pheromones, or maybe it was the Titan formula finally seeping through into your disciplined psyche thanks to all of the poisoned blood pumping through your veins but somehow you found an unsettling truth in Poison Ivy’s words.
For all your bravado and unwavering nobility in the face of death, it would all mean nothing if you were to succumb to the Titan formula. Hugo Strange would initiate Protocol 10 as planned, which would no doubt create cataclysmic consequences for Arkham City. The Joker would have his last laugh as dozens in Gotham General perish from his poisoned blood. Countless innocent political prisoners and Arkham City staff within the prison would also be hunted down like animals and killed for the entertainment of psychopaths like Victor Zsasz and the Riddler.
All because you were too proud to lower yourself this one time.
Much as you would hate to admit it, the redhead’s words struck a rather notable chord with you and you couldn’t ignore it. You were sacrificing the needs of the many whom you sworn to protect just to preserve your own dignity, when it should be vice versa.
The needs of the city must always come before your own. Always.
Her smug grin only grew wider as she saw the mental tug-of-war take place over your conflicted face. “Having second thoughts, are we?”
The resignation in your voice, after moments of expedited soul-searching, told her the whole story. “You’ll keep your end of the deal, Ivy. The cure for a kiss.”
Tilting her head sideways, she playfully wagged her finger at you before leaning in even closer.
“Silly Bat, I already told you. You’ll do exactly as I say, and like it. Once I’m satisfied, you’ll get your cure,” she chided.
You quickly bit back a retort, realizing that at this point she had the higher ground and that it would be very advantageous for your own self-preservation and subsequently the protection of Gotham to simply acquiesce with her degrading demands.
"For now at least," you reasoned to yourself.
“Fine,” you grunted reluctantly under your breath, averting her gleaming eyes.
Refusing to give her the satisfaction initially, she quickly cupped your chin with her fingers and forced you to look her square in the eyes.
“Say it again, darling. I want to see the words come out of your mouth,” she snarled through gritted teeth, her lips curling into a smug grin as she could almost smell the defeat radiating off you.
Despite it all, you defiantly shot her your infamous soul-piercing glare that would render any superstitious and cowardly criminal weak at the knees. Unfortunately, due to current circumstances it lacked its usual fear factor.
“You win,” you spat out venomously, barely containing your contempt for the plant queen. “I’ll kiss your feet.”
And just like that she let your chin droop down and stood up with a triumphant smile, visibly pleased at your capitulation.
“See, that wasn’t so hard was it, darling? You and your false bravado, always making things more difficult than they need to be. We both know you came to me for a reason, Batman. Because you need me. Only I can make you whole again. But my generosity comes with a price, and I fully expect to enjoy the fruits of our bargain,” she declared, her hands on her curved hips.
Your eyes reluctantly dropped to her painted toes, pressed down against the dirt as her heel lifted off the ground. Glowering at the limb you would soon pay oral tribute to, your eyes couldn’t help but admire her near immaculate blood red nail polish, her petite arches, her baby smooth heels, her everything.
“Tell me, Dark Knight, and be honest. What do you think of my red nail polish?” she taunted just to rub it in further, arching her foot upwards so you could see her slender toes pressed against the ground. Despite your humiliating position, even you couldn’t deny just how aesthetically pleasing the color was especially contrasted against her floral green flesh.
“You like it, don't you love?” she added coyly, no doubt noticing the lingering stare you gave her extended foot.
Swallowing a lump of saliva as well as whatever remaining pride you had left, you mustered up your response.
“Yes,” you grunted feebly.
“Yes what?” came her amused response, her hands on her curved hands as she struck another voluptuous pose.
Seething in silent fury, you could only grit your teeth in frustration. “Yes......mistress.”
“Good boy!” she cooed approvingly, lifting her right leg above your cowl and playfully patting the base of your mask with her foot. You did nothing but scowled as she slowly traced her painted toes down your face, yet another humiliating act that caused her to snicker inwardly in triumph.
After trailing down your chin, her toes touched the ground again, stretching and scrunching against the dirt floor anxiously as they awaited your literal lip service.
“Now kiss my toes, Batman. All of them,” she demanded in a dominant sneer, her words hovering above you as you lowered your neck and proceeded to:
1123112211.title: "Kiss my feet."

choices: Ivy has another idea. Perhaps for you to lick "other" places on her body?
11231122111.content:
A mixture of different emotions cycled through your mind as you bent down and planted the first, fateful kiss on Poison Ivy’s big toe.
Shame. Disgust. Anger. Frustration.
But all of those paled in comparison to the utterly demoralizing realization that came shortly after your lips pursed together and pressed against the vixen’s painted toenail.
You liked it.
The Dark Knight, that inspired fear in the hearts of the most vile and villainous of Gotham City’s criminal underbelly, who single handedly brought down entire criminal empires with his intelligence and resilience, who also filled the halls of Arkham Asylum with a rogues gallery of psychopaths and career criminals, had just willingly subjected himself to the worst kind of humiliation possible at the hands of his greatest female adversary and somehow derided a perverse pleasure from it.
“See, that wasn’t so hard, was it?” came her taunting purr as you kissed her big toe. Your tongue briefly brushed up against her flesh as you stared back at her beaming down at you with that condescending look of hers.
In that moment, you wanted more than anything to wipe that smug grin off her face. You wanted more than anything to muster your strength back up, reach for that spare Batarang in your gauntlet, escape from her floral trap and simply take the cure by any means necessary.
But there was a small part of you, inexplicably growing larger and larger by the minute, that liked the taste of her skin against your battered lips. That welcomed this sudden reversal in the usual power dynamics between you and your rogues’ gallery. It was truly a startling emotional dichotomy you were forced to grapple with.
On one hand, you hated how she was doing this to you.
Yet somehow inexplicably, you also craved this sexual frustration that was awakening within you.
“Well, keep going. My other babies are getting jealous, Dark Knight. Won’t you make them feel better too?” she sneered, wiggling her other toes as well.
Then, swallowing whatever dignity you still had left you reluctantly bent down yet again and quickly plastered another quick kiss on her next longest toe.
Immediately sensing you trying to get through this quickly, Ivy immediately jolted her foot forward and into your open mouth.
“What are you-hmmphhh?” you gagged as her big and index toes entered in your mouth and rested on your tongue.
“Tsk tsk, Batman. You’re not making my babies feel very loved,” she scolded, wagging one finger in your face disapprovingly as the two toes currently in your mouth stretched out and began scratching at your uvula.
Tasting a mixture of her sweaty odor and some dirt that had accumulated underneath her toenails you held back some choice comments as she merely chuckled.
Then, just as soon as she put them in she sensually withdrew her toes from your mouth. Wiping your saliva off on the ground, she resumed her high arched pose for your viewing pleasure.
“Now, where were we?” she smiled, her emerald eyes gleaming in sadistic pleasure at your humbling at the hands, or rather the feet of Poison Ivy.
This time, you lingered a bit longer on her next toe. The sounds of your lips puckering against her toes must’ve been music to the redhead’s ears, because you could certainly feel the excitement and near ecstasy radiating off her scantily clad body.
“Oh. You have no idea how long I’ve waited to see you in your rightful place, Batman. Like all the other meat-sacks will soon be. Worshiping Mother Nature,” she exclaimed triumphantly, as you finally planted one last lingering kiss on her pinky toe.
Offering you the next one after she wiggled all of the toes that you had just finished kissing, Ivy was clearly enjoying every second of seeing you humble yourself like this for her entertainment.
It was heaven for her, and hell on earth for you.
Yet despite your mental objections, something in you began to change as you began planting more lingering and meaningful kisses on her foot. Not immediately, but gradually you felt a change in how you viewed her bare feet.
Before, they were simply disgusting appendages used to degrade and demoralize you. But now, with every second that your lips remained planted on her skin they became more...stimulating for your senses.
And as ashamed as you were to admit this, by the third toe on her second foot you were beginning to crave the salty taste of her sweat lining the sides of her toes. The feel of her womanly flesh against your bruised and battered jawline. The scent of her unwashed and pungent toes wafting into your nostrils.
Your disciplined mind fought against this idea, but your body had all but succumbed to it. Each time she plopped a toe in your mouth, your taste buds exploded in euphoric pleasure. Every caress of his tongue against her satiny bottom caused waves of pleasure to ripple through your body, especially in your groin area.
Her mocking laughter boomed above and all around you.
“Look at how pathetic you are, darling. To think that you somehow defeated me at the peak of my abilities at the Asylum is simply galling. But here you are, worshiping my feet.”
Then, as if that same impulse somehow bypassed your honed mental faculties and gained control of your body, your tongue shot out and licked in between her middle and ring toes. Pulling back into your mouth a few specks of dirt mixed in with what could possible be her toejam had quite the effect on you.
More surprising than that, it had quite the effect on Poison Ivy.
“Oooooh. Momma liked that,” came her sexy drawl, her voice suddenly husky and wanting, or at least more so than usual.
Her toes even began curling and clasping together in response as a heavy sigh escaped her lips.
“Do that again, Batman,” she half ordered half purred in a husky whisper, almost compelling you to make her aroused wish your command.
Another sigh drenched in ecstasy escaped her lips as your tongue explored the area between her ring toe and pinky toe, causing her to almost shudder in euphoric bliss.
Now with the bitter taste of her foot odor as well as the ground that she had walked on now firmly ingrained within your taste buds, you somehow found yourself becoming fixated with what you were doing.
It was quite possibly the equivalent of a recreational drug activating that dopamine high in your brain, only replaced with the natural taste of her bare feet.
So much so that you found yourself going back to doing just that after you finished kissing her pinky toe. Your tongue soon became blackened with the sweat and dirt glistening from her soles as you continued licking between her toes with the slavish attention of a dog trying to please its master.
The irony of that metaphor had hit you like an anvil from above, but you quickly jettisoned that from your mind as you found yourself hopelessly addicted to worshiping your archenemy’s bare feet.
Just as you were about to fully indulge yourself, she suddenly turned away from you. And just like an addicted user being denied his high, you let out an almost childish whimper as she stood with her back facing you.
She was still breathing heavily as your head remained bowed, both in shame for the shell of the man you’ve become to become whole again and more surprisingly in anticipation for what she has to say about this.
“You know what I think, Batman?” she finally said, one hand on her hips as she continued to face away from you.
This was the point where you would retort back in a last-ditch attempt to regain control of the situation, but unfortunately your actions had spoken louder than whatever words you could summon at the moment.
“I think you’re enjoying this. I think you like worshiping my sexy feet. I think you crave my taste, my scent, my everything. Am I correct in this assumption?” she smiled.
You couldn’t bring yourself to deny or argue against what was being said. Tilting her head back towards you with an absolutely sinister grin plastered across her face, you could only look back down.
To her, your silence was the only answer she needed.
“Like I told you once before lover, no man can resist Poison Ivy. Not even a Batman,” she smiled softly, her hand slowly creeping towards her groin area.
Most humiliating of all, instead of seeing her sneering face you were instead met with her bare ass, curving into her slender back.
“Tell me how much you want my feet, Batman!” she cooed in a singsong voice, as she lifted the other foot up to showcase her narrow and well-shaped arch.
“I-I…” You were at a loss for words. Now is usually the time for a clever rebuttal, a snarky comeback, anything to tell off the former botanist. But you couldn’t muster the strength to defy her again. Couldn’t, or more appropriately wouldn’t.
The words were almost out of your mouth before you even knew what was happening.
“You’ve the most beautiful feet I’ve ever laid eyes on. I-I want your feet more than anything. More than anything. More than...Gotham’s well-being. More than…”
Thankfully she held up a hand to silence your frantic ramblings.
“Good boy,” came her approving purr, one last condescending insult to emphatically rub in the inevitable: that Poison Ivy had broken the Batman.
“Do you see now how foolish you were, trying to attack your master? Gotham may be your city, but you are in my world now Batman. And look at you now. On your knees like the dog you are, rightfully worshiping the feet of your mistress. Harley may have feared you lover, but you’re just another meatsack who thought himself worthy of Mother Nature. And since we now both know how wrong you were,” came her scathing sneer, her words evoking a paradoxical blend of pure hatred and arousal that only fueled your sudden longing for the plant queen.
She then presented her other dirtied sole to you, her wrinkled flesh blackened with dirt for your awaiting tongue.
Poison Ivy then uttered the command that would forever seal your fate:
“Lick.”

1123121.content:
- Since finishing Batman: Arkham Origins, I decided to use this as a vehicle for branching characters from the Origins game to here. The Harley Quinn option is still the first one, I just added the second option as the Arkham Origins universe. Thanks.
